channel.title: Why would jagex take off pking in the wilderness!?
channel.description: And the trading thing, I mean, If someone in real life gives someone money, for rs money, its the same!! Because the Rs guy worked for his rs money, and the other guys worked for his real life money......

item.title: Why would jagex take off pking in the wilderness!?
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“pizza pie, post:22, topic:184030”]First off, i used to make money off real world trading in runescape. and i still am, by quitting, im selling my accounts, 1 for ipod, 1 for $60 and another not sold yet…

so yah… and trust me. runescape is going to become one of those stupid games like DragonQuest or w/e the ***** quest…

and lastly, for all you gay fags who still do play. i wish someday you come to you senses like some of the people… and now im actually becoming glad they made that update because like the 3rd or 2nd person who posted, i quit because of the unbearable boredom…

so yah… think about that before you judge me…[/quote]JUDGED

FAIL

kthxbye

item.title: Why would jagex take off pking in the wilderness!?
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

First off, i used to make money off real world trading in runescape. and i still am, by quitting, im selling my accounts, 1 for ipod, 1 for $60 and another not sold yet…

so yah… and trust me. runescape is going to become one of those stupid games like DragonQuest or w/e the ***** quest…

and lastly, for all you gay fags who still do play. i wish someday you come to you senses like some of the people… and now im actually becoming glad they made that update because like the 3rd or 2nd person who posted, i quit because of the unbearable boredom…

so yah… think about that before you judge me…

Read full topic

item.title: Why would jagex take off pking in the wilderness!?
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

[quote=“1HITKN0CK0UT, post:20, topic:184030”][quote author=pizza pie link=topic=245703.msg2072360#msg2072360 date=1203785646]
And the trading thing, I mean, If someone in real life gives someone money, for rs money, its the same!! Because the Rs guy worked for his rs money, and the other guys worked for his real life money…
[/quote]

they still have pking its just only for members ever heard of bounty hunter? and the rs gold was real bad because people were going to sue jagexx because someone ripped them off on there gold and then jagex got frustrated with all the complaits probly . what would you do if you paid $1000 for 1B gp that never showed? huh?[/quote]

First of all, if you’re gonna waste over $5 on a game that’s not even gonna benefit you then you’re an idiot. If someone would actually pay 1000 dollars for Pixelated Items on a game that can buy you whatever you want, that’s just, you have to be super retarded to do that. And to pay someone you don’t even know.

Real world Trading for Runescape is stupid in general.

item.title: Why would jagex take off pking in the wilderness!?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

Taharok:

This is becoming progressively more pathetic! RuneScape is made by Jagex. It is their game to do what the hell they want with it. This update made a lot of people quit, but all the new ones joining are leveling it out. There has been practically no increase in players since about summer of last year (based on average.) Now, RuneScape is going to start massively growing again and people will get over it. Get over it now and stop trying to ‘do a good thing’. If you wanted to help people, you wouldn’t be trying to do so in a video game.

just because you dont care anymore =\ i know how you made your cash which you cant do anymore but you will find new ways…

Read full topic

item.title: Why would jagex take off pking in the wilderness!?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

This is becoming progressively more pathetic! RuneScape is made by Jagex. It is their game to do what the hell they want with it. This update made a lot of people quit, but all the new ones joining are leveling it out. There has been practically no increase in players since about summer of last year (based on average.) Now, RuneScape is going to start massively growing again and people will get over it. Get over it now and stop trying to ‘do a good thing’. If you wanted to help people, you wouldn’t be trying to do so in a video game.
